Plot: An Ex-French Soldier begins participating in underground street fights in order to make money for his brother's family.
Title: Lionheart
Writer: S.N. Warren (earlier screenplay), Jean-Claude Van Damme (story), Sheldon Lettich (screenplay), Jean-Claude Van Damme (screenplay)
Actors: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Harrison Page, Deborah Rennard, Lisa Pelikan
